body:
I am so sad right now. I factory reseted my computer. Everything was faster and all, till I realized all my horror stories are gone... My sister was sad as well. 21 pages of epic horror are all freaking gone. So there won't be that much horror stories anymore. I will have to re-write everything.

I am sorry... :(

title: Why? Why?

replies.body: ;c if ur really desperate, i think experts will still be able to extract your stories...
